title: Critical Mathematical Thinking Development Module Using Symmedian Geometry

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational geometry concepts (triangles, angles, length) and algebraic problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Spatiotemporal flexibility ensured through digital devices, combining weekly intensive workshops with individual assignments

learning_goals: Learners analyze the geometric properties of symmedians in triangles and enhance spatial reasoning skills.
Learners design a protocol for systematically solving mathematical problems by applying a mixed research methodology (experiment + case study).
Learners critically evaluate errors found in geometric proofs and propose alternative solution strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
